messages.subject: Homeschooling Article from EdPress
messages.msgSnippet: The Association of Educational Publishers (EdPress) has published an article in EP Online, the Association s electronic newsletter, about homeschooling. We
messages.messageBody:
The Association of Educational Publishers (EdPress) has published an
article in EP Online, the Association's electronic newsletter, about
homeschooling. We offer one short quote here:

"The experience of homeschooling is as much about adults uncovering the
shimmering, infinite quality of learning itself as it is about kids
absorbing knowledge."

This is one you'll want to read for yourself!

Please click to our special page linking to this outstanding article:

http://www.home-ed-magazine.com/wnw/edpress.html

Please share this message with your friends, and with other lists and networks.

We're proud of this one!

Mark and Helen Hegener, Publishers
Home Education Magazine
HEM@...
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com
